entry.value: select r.code AS ROLE, rf.funccode AS AUTHCODE from DEF_ROLE r inner join DEF_ROLEFUNC rf on rf.ROLECODE=r.CODE where r.SYSTYPE= :sysType and r.status='0' order by r.code, rf.funccode
select r.code, r.name from DEF_ROLE r inner join DEF_ROLEFUNC rf on rf.ROLECODE=r.CODE where r.SYSTYPE= :sysType and rf.funcCode= :funcCode
select r.code, r.name from DEF_ROLE r where r.SYSTYPE= :sysType and r.CODE not in (select rolecode from DEF_ROLEFUNC where funcCode = :funcCode)
delete from DEF_ROLEFUNC rf where rf.funcCode = :funcCode and rf.ROLECODE in (:delRole)

select u.code as userCode, u.name as userName, u.depcode as depCode, dep.name as depName from DEF_USER u inner join DEF_USERROLE ur on u.code = ur.usercode inner join DEF_DEP dep on dep.code = u.depCode where ur.roleCode = :roleCode

select usr.code, usr.name from DEF_USER usr inner join DEF_DEP dep on dep.code = usr.depcode where usr.code not in (select usercode from DEF_USERROLE where rolecode = :roleCode) and (:depCode = 'All' or dep.code = :depCode)
select func.code, func.name, func.parent from DEF_FUNC func inner join DEF_ROLEFUNC rf on func.code = rf.funccode where rf.rolecode = :roleCode

select distinct func.code, func.name, func.parent from DEF_FUNC func, (select * from DEF_FUNC where (:parent = 'All' or (parent = :parent or code= :parent))) func1 where (func.code=func1.code or func.parent=func1.code) and func.sysType=:sysType and func.code not in (select funccode from DEF_ROLEFUNC where rolecode = :roleCode)
delete from DEF_USERROLE ur where ur.roleCode = :roleCode and ur.USERCODE in (:delUsrs)
delete from DEF_ROLEFUNC rf where rf.roleCode = :roleCode and rf.funccode in (:delFunc)
select distinct u.* from DEF_USER u left join DEF_USERROLE ur on ur.USERCODE = u.code
select r.code, r.name, auth.usercode from def_role r left join (select * from def_userrole ur where ur.usercode = :userCode) auth on r.code = auth.rolecode

SELECT DISTINCT * FROM ( SELECT (P.LEVEL*1000+P.PARENT*100+P.SEQUENCE*0.01) AS S, P.* FROM DEF_FUNC P INNER JOIN DEF_ROLEFUNC RF ON P.CODE = RF.FUNCCODE INNER JOIN DEF_ROLE R ON R.CODE = RF.ROLECODE WHERE RF.ROLECODE IN (:roleCodes) AND P.STATUS = '1' AND P.SYSTYPE = :sysType AND R.STATUS = '0' AND R.SYSTYPE = :sysType ) TT ORDER BY S
select usercode, max(updatetime) as lastpwd from def_pwdlog group by usercode
update def_user set pwdexpiredtime = :pwdExpiredTime where code = :userCode
update def_user set prestatus = status, status = '2' where status not in ('2', '9') and now() - lastlogintime > :pwdAccountDisable
update def_user set status = '9' where status != '9' and now() - lastlogintime > :pwdAccountDelete
select * from cfg_Sequence order by seqNode
select * from cfg_Sequence where seqNode = :seqNode
update cfg_Sequence set nextSeq=:nextSeq,rounds=:rounds,updateTime=:updateTime where seqNode=:seqNode and nextSeq=:oldSeq
INSERT INTO cfg_Sequence (seqNode, NEXTSEQ, ROUNDS,updateTime ) VALUES (:seqNode,:nextSeq,:rounds,:updateTime)
